column6:
A doctor is becoming famous for his seeming ability to cure patients of terrible diseases. Nobody's sure how he does it, but everyone is fascinated by what seems to be a "healing touch." When the mysterious doc crosses paths with the scientific mind of Reed Richards, the FF are in for some surprises they never bargained for--and the adventures are just beginning!,2005,8
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.50
column7: | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic | Thing
column8: | inker:Jeffrey Huet | penciller:Carlo Pagualyan | writer:Jeff Parker | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
